text.quote: 000: Clause 10, page 8, line 41, leave out “another adult (an “adult needing care”)” and insert “an adult (“an adult needing care”) or disabled child”
000: After Clause 10, insert the following new Clause—
“Health promotion of carers
(1) In exercising their functions health bodies shall—
text.IndentOne: (a) promote and safeguard the health and well-being of carers;
(b) ensure that effective procedures exist to identify patients who are or are about to become carers;
(c) ensure that appropriate systems exist to ensure that carers receive appropriate information and advice; and
(d) ensure that systems are in place to ensure that the relevant general medical services are rendered to their patients who are carers.
text.quote: (2) In relation to subsections (1)(b) and (c), the Secretary of State may by regulations further provide for the strategies to be developed.”
000: Clause 14, page 12, line 35, at end insert—

“( ) Services of an intimate nature can only be provided to the disabled person and not to meet a carer’s need for support and regulations may make provision about what is, or is not, of an intimate nature for the purposes of subsection (3).”
